email_chain.subject: Freight Offer for Steel Coils - Rotterdam to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Dear James,

I hope this message finds you well. We are pleased to offer you a freight rate for the shipment of 12,000 MT of Steel Coils from Rotterdam to Shanghai on CIF terms.

The vessel we propose is the OCEAN BREEZE, with a DWT of 85,000 and LOA of 250m. The laycan is set for 15-20 November, and the initial freight quote is USD 45.50 per MT.

Please let us know if this works for you or if you need any further details.

Best regards,
Emily Carter
Maritime Traders

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Steel Coils - Rotterdam to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Hi Emily,

Thank you for the offer. USD 45.50 seems a bit high given the current market conditions. Could you consider lowering the freight to USD 43.00 per MT?

Also, could you confirm the demurrage rate per day?

Looking forward to your reply.

Best,
James Wilson
Global Cargo

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Steel Coils - Rotterdam to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Dear James,

Thank you for your response. Considering our long-term relationship, I can offer a revised freight rate of USD 44.00 per MT. The demurrage rate is set at USD 10,000 per day.

Please note that the laycan remains 15-20 November, and the loading window is still 24 hours. I trust this revised offer meets your expectations.

Best regards,
Emily Carter
Maritime Traders

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Steel Coils - Rotterdam to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Hi Emily,

Thank you for the revised offer. We can agree to the USD 44.00 per MT, provided the laycan is strictly adhered to. Could you confirm the stem details and any potential delays?

Best,
James Wilson
Global Cargo

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Steel Coils - Rotterdam to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Dear James,

I confirm that the laycan will be strictly adhered to, and the stem details are as follows: loading at Rotterdam on 15th November, with a 24-hour loading window. There are no anticipated delays at this stage.

Please let me know if you need any further clarifications.

Best regards,
Emily Carter
Maritime Traders

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Steel Coils - Rotterdam to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Hi Emily,

Thank you for the confirmation. We agree to the terms and will proceed with the booking. Please send over the contract for review.

Best,
James Wilson
Global Cargo
